purpose: Facilitates the exploration and implementation of Large Language Models (LLMs) and generative AI in Go applications
principle: Builds on Go language standards to provide a clean and effective interface for interacting with LLMs and generative AI technologies
reusability: Designed as a Go library, it can be integrated into Go applications to leverage LLMs and generative AI capabilities
limitations: Being in alpha status, the library might have limited features and potential stability issues. It is also primarily designed for Go developers
